subject: Women's British Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Michelle Wie, who started a wave of teenage stars on the women’s tour, now wants to be known as a champion golfer. She’s at plus-1 after 36 holes at the Women’s British Open.
snippet: Michelle Wie, who started a wave of teenage stars on the women’s tour, now wants to be known as a champion golfer. She’s at plus-1 after 36 holes at the Women’s British Open.
